evidence_example.title: Scicos Flex application with demo prototype daughter board
evidence_example.small_descr: This is the skeleton of a Scicos-EEB demo configured for the EE_FLEX board plus the first demoboard developed in the context of the Scilab/Scicos integration.
evidence_example.long_descr: This is the skeleton of a Scicos-EEB demo configured for the EE_FLEX board plus the first demoboard developed in the context of the Scilab/Scicos integration. This is not a complete demo but works as an empty template to be used as a starting point for a new Scicos application.
